events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product was not what I expected. I would like to request a refund for it as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s message about returning the product and getting their money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily for handling the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello, I’m Emily, and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number to proceed?
To process your refund efficiently, please confirm the product name and reason for the return. This helps us speed things up.
The order number is 789456123, and the product is a Bluetooth speaker. It stopped working within two days of use.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process right away and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the faulty item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I will wait for the shipping label and return the speaker as soon as possible.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the shipping label email and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
The refund has been successfully processed and credited back to your account. We are closing this case now, and thank you for your patience.
